content.rendered:
I had three minutes to grab this portrait of Eno, Ibibio Sound Machine’s super dynamic front woman, *after* their brilliant and extremely energetic show at Village Underground at the end of November. I’ll never know how she managed to look so cool and collected.

Read the Rhythm Passport review.
